website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for jazz dance students and performers, but don’t expect these shoes to hold up for more than a few performances.
pros: Slip on easily and quickly, and stay on through demanding dance numbers
cons: Shoe sizes run a bit large
Tend to stretch out over time, and shoes will wear out after a few weeks of rehearsals or performances

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my 16 year old son for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 16 year old son for a musical he is in. He normally wears an 11 1/2 in tennis shoe and the size 12 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to order jazz shoes for my daughter when she auditioned and earned a role for our local community theater. It was a first time for us, so I had no idea which of the shoes online to order. Ultimately I decided on these based on the good reviews and I’m glad I did! They were perfect. Fit as expected and good quality.theyve stood up to the last three months of rehearsals and still look great. For reference my daughter is a size 5-6 depending on the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Moroney

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even in Chair Yoga we get out of the chair and do some standing poses. I wear a size 8.5 shoe but I need orthodics in them. So sometimes I have to go up a half size or even a full size. I ordered these and they fit perfect with my orthotics in them! They are super soft leather so it's like I am barefoot with the support I need. I can do all of the seated and standing poses, not perfectly, but that would take a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: My feet are grounded with my jazz moves.
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions and purchased the shoe a size or two up . I wear a 10 1/2 or 11 when it's cut small i know to get a 12 or 13 because i have wide feet . But great quality . I have used the shoe many times. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Tee

customer_reviews.title: Good for salsa lessons.  Good price.  Correct fit per seller's sizing chart.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Salsa dancing only. I'm learning at a dance studio that is VERY protective of its pristine wood floor, requiring dedicated dance shoes ONLY(!). These are just right for that. I like the color (don't like black shoes) and they're the same shoe that my amazing Salsa dance instructor wears. I figured I wouldn't go wrong following her example, and I was right. I just hope they hold up well (my first "Jazz Shoe" and they seem kinda flimsy...). The seller's size conversion chart worked well. I wear an 11-1/2 American man's shoe and purchased Size 13 per the seller's chart. Resulted in a comfortable fit and I can dance for hours in them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Overthere

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I am size 10 woman I bought 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I am size 10 woman I bought 9 they fit just right for dance not tight not loose just right!
customer_reviews.author: Ali_CS

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We had tried them on in a land store, so knew what size to purchase, but when I checked the price at the store, I checked prices at Amazon. Found out the land store was comparable with many of the prices here, but did save :) with this brand. They looked like everyone else's shoes, were comfortable for my granddaughter (she had to dance in them on stage) and she was thrilled with this purchase. (She is 8!)
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Chart is Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying these shoes for my son's first theater & jazz class, but we needed something fast and affordable. I measure his foot from toe to heel on paper and measured it (10.25") then ordered the 9.5 according to the sizing chart. I was absolutely shocked and pleasantly surprised how they fit his foot like a glove with only the slightest pinch of room at the toe. So grateful for an accurate sizing chart. These will be my go-to shoes for him when he needs another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Huge hole after 3 uses..I do NOT recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 4 for my 10 year old son. They fit, but they are a little shorter than expected (I even measured and referred to size chart). I had hoped they'd last atleast this year, but they didn't even last a week. My 60 pound 10 year old used these for three days and now they have a huge hole at his toe just in time for opening night of his current musical. Just invest in something better!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Fit was perfect. Purchased these jazz shoes for my son's play. He normally wears a Men's size 11. The measurements for a size 11 were the measurements for the size 13. The site made it easy to figure it out though. I just took a measuring tape and measured his foot from heel to toe. Then just ordered the size from the chart. Worked out well. The shoes are very soft leather. Would definitely purchase from this store again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Finley

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These were too large in some places, and tight in others. My daughter was never able to dance in them as the leather on the top of the shoe kept digging into her leg.
customer_reviews.author: Kody Jones

customer_reviews.title: like I usually wear in jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were way too freaking big. No way I could wear them. I bought a size 6, like I usually wear in jazz shoes. Took them into my local dance shop and we sized them as a 9. I cant figure out how to return them and had to buy new ones quick before our performance. What a waste of money. Quality was not great either.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice dance shoes for a good price! Fit just right, however, remember to order up in size! My daughter wears a 3 and we ordered a 4.5. Make note of the measurements they give for sizing, they were pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: JLL

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, but they didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality, they’re sturdy and exactly what she needed for operetta. However, she was miserable the fit was awful. We followed the instructions to a T. I think it depends on how much you swell as a person. My daughter tends to swell when she is overactive. Her feet swell and the shoes would barely go on. I don’t have any fantastic advice for ordering other than make sure you understand the return policy/instructions incase you need to exchange them. It’s not the companies fault, and it’s not a faulty product... shoes are just a difficult product to purchase online.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: When ordering these it seemed like a good plan to list a toe to heel ...
customer_reviews.text: When ordering these it seemed like a good plan to list a toe to heel measurement along with the sizing, but it did not help us order and receive a size that was even close to fitting. I had two people measure my daughter toe to heel and both came up with 9 3/4" so we ordered 8.5M. When they arrived and she tried them on it was like putting on clown shoes. Probably an inch too big. I am giving these 2 stars simply based on the apparent quality of the shoes although we have no idea how they will hold up during dancing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Tai Chi
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what I had been searching for to wear at Tai Chi. They bend in the middle which is needed for accurate foot placement. They are a little big so, I added socks. The quality is cheap (4stars) but I wear them 3X @ week only. No more hurting feet from Tai Chi. Very relieved literally & figuratively.
customer_reviews.author: beachykeen

customer_reviews.title: Used the measurement guidlines...fits JUST RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Living in a rural town, in a rural state means no dance stores within 300 miles. I was very nervous buying my daughter's dance shoes online, but because this company had a measurement guideline, we could get the exact fit. Shoes are moderate quality, but since the fit was perfect - they will work great for my little dancer. Use the measurement guide and they should fit you perfectly too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arcand

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected ordered size 14 a little narrow for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected ordered size 14 a little narrow for wide feet but it does give a little so it will work for a 2 1/2 hour play
customer_reviews.author: Lovemybooks

customer_reviews.title: Good but run VERY large
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for a dance class and had tried on a different brand in store and determined she needed a 10.5 or 11. We had to return these 3 times before we finally got the size that fit, and it ended up being a 9.5. I didn't use their size chart at first because we thought we knew which size we needed (that was my fault), but even using it after, we still had to exchange them twice more. The service was quick and there was never any issue with returning them, so we are ultimately happy with them, but beware of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: alblndl

customer_reviews.title: perfect length too wide
customer_reviews.text: I tried to follow reviews and ordered what I thought would fit. the length was perfect but the shoe was too wide. After my daughter practiced one time, she had a hard time keeping the shoe on for the dance production rehearsals.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed wearing these shoes for the past three months while attend dance lessons with my partner. I order a slightly larger size (1.5 sizes) than I wear in everyday shoes, but fit well out of the bag with plenty of room for my toes and continue to fit well as they are worn. At the current rate of wear I expect to get 8-12 months of weekly dance lessons out of them which is very acceptable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Takeyabue

customer_reviews.title: These were Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yearly daughter has a size 9 foot and is a very wide width. These fit perfectly and are very easy to get on. She loves them and they are so comfortable for her foot.
customer_reviews.author: suzsotelo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bad fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to use in dance class. She has a very wide foot & generally has a difficult time finding shoes to fit. I thought these would be perfect. For the first time ever these shoes were too big. She made them work, but said she felt like her feet were constantly about pop out of the shoes. Buy, just buy smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: S Groome

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son and he loved the way they fit. He hasn’t danced in them yet so not sure how they hold up. They are a little pricey for the quality of the shoe but what do you do! My son normally wears 10 1/2 and I measured his foot per instruction and ordered a 10. They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DZom

customer_reviews.title: Too big and very cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product that doesn’t fit well. Daughter didn’t end up being able to use them for the show she was in. Very thin material. Overall not a quality product. I tried to go cheap and I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Mostly true to size. Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading a LOT of reviews for this product I decided to order a half-size smaller for my 16-year old son. He normally wears a men's size 8, so I ordered a 7 1/2. They fit perfectly. He is required to wear these for a performance class. I am also satisfied with the quality. As others have noted, these should only be worn for classes and performances. My son wears his sneakers to class, then changes into these shoes, then out of them when class is over. They've held up great. Would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bodee Galivan

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, light and provides great support
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm writing this review my daughter used the shoes for her play at school. I asked her abouy how the shoes feel on her feet after few weeks of wearing it as they are required to wear jazz shoes during their play practice. She said it fits right. It's very flexible yet she still gets the perfect support at the bottom. She even compared it with some of her friends' shoes and she said they love hers because theirs are very thin at the bottom and it hurts their feet on long standing. This shoes according to me teen is perfect. It's light and it protects her from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for this price
customer_reviews.text: My son is doing his first musical and needed these shoes. Now my son is a size 13 so we were so scared that the shoes would not fit. I won’t lie when we first looked at them we thought there is no way these things are gonna fit him, but after putting them on his feet, they were perfect. I also thought he would get blisters until they were broken in, but not a blister in sight. He loves his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Baby girl

customer_reviews.title: VERY Large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to manufacturer specs and the shoes were heeeeeuuuuuuuuge. Great quality shoe, though! I'm in the process of returning them for a refund but will be ordering another, smaller size of this same shoe possibly a whole size smaller. My feet measure 10.25" when traced on paper and ordered a size 10 in the shoes. Verrrrry big. Will most likely go down one full size. I'll report back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, I suppose it was pretty good. I like the arch support and the color is not too shabby either. I think the heel is nice, seems durable so far and that's always important. I think the shoe is a tad tight I ordered my normal show size, an 8, and my toes are all up in there. I know once I've broken them in - it's going to have that big toe imprint which I do not like, but I'll survive.
customer_reviews.author: J.Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Tried as a regular dance shoe, didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Tried as a regular dance shoe, didn't work for me. I love to dance but can't find a comfortable dance shoe. So, I gave these a try. Problem is I'm a size 8 wide. I ordered 9 1/2 (since they don't stock these in wide). They were way too tight and having the separate sole and heal felt very strange. Didn't really get a chance to see if they are comfortable or not. They are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Decent product!
customer_reviews.text: Decent product! It served its purpose. My son needed them for a musical stage play that he performed in and only wore them for a week so I can’t rate it’s durability, but overall decent jazz shoe. My son typically wears a size 2.5-3. I purchased a size 4 so he’d have a little extra room. They fitted him perfectly with a tad bit of space left to move his toes and wear socks. I’d order again!
customer_reviews.author: Tynisha T.

customer_reviews.title: A very good shoe for ballroom line dancing
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes and other dances asked me where to get them. Very comfortable and not too hot. When these wear out, I will buy another pair. The seller should note the buyer's email and notify them in a year or so, to see if they would like another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Manning Whittier

customer_reviews.title: Measure Twice, Buy Once
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 11 yo son's first theater performance. He wore them with black ankle Fruit of the Loom socks (he is picky on sock softness) and he said they were perfectly fine. No blisters or rubbing. He wore them 7 hours a day, 5-6 times a week for six weeks. They still look great after being danced in by a 5'3" and 130 lbs kid. Get a good measurement and don't buy large. I had to resist the urge to buy the next size up and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: StlFam4

customer_reviews.title: The Struggle is Real.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the dance shoe because I am on my forth shoe now, I was really hoping that I would find my match. The shoe shows ideal quality for a long amount of time and to get the most important part in a dance practice/or performance is the meaningful gift to tell a story. I am hoping to be successful in finding a way to make my own experience with a better ending.
customer_reviews.author: XDOV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school play
customer_reviews.text: We had to purchase these for a school play. They did what was expected. He would wear these shoes anywhere though. They are okay for wearing for a couple of hours but not all day long. He needed them for the various dance routines in the play. Definitely not for everyday use. He said after awhile they got uncomfortable. Will put them up on a shelf till next play.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. White

customer_reviews.title: I had to return these
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these and order the Capezio brand jazz shoe instead. The quality was just so-so and they were very loose. I could have replaced them with a smaller size but decided the name brand was a better choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: getoverit

customer_reviews.title: The shoes is good
customer_reviews.text: I have been dancing without dancing shoes for so long that it feels somewhat like an invention gone right with the shoes on. However, the shoes slips of my feet and the insole keeps coming up...but my spins are impeccable in them. I would probably buy it again but a little smaller. I brought a 9 i would go probably an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Shaybez

customer_reviews.title: Shoes have holes after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of shoes, each had holes after only 2 months of use. I've been a dancer all my life and never walked outside with them, treated them the same way I did a pair of capezio jazz shoes I bought in high school that lasted me several years before having to replace them. Extremely disappointed. You get what you pay for. I used these shoes dancing partner dances 9-14 hours/week
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bird

customer_reviews.title: satisfactory  shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my dancing in the performance Newsies and am satisfied with them. They're comfortable and work smoothly. The quality is leather or anything so if you're going to be dancing intensely for a long time everyday you may was to get a pair of higher quality. Overall very good shoes that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: They were not the cheapest but feel like they wont last. The middle is a stretchy material and the seam is already pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son needed jazz shoes for musical theater and these worked perfectly. I keep telling him not to wear them outside, but he doesn't listen. They seem to be holding up well and since he's a kid, if he does another show like this we'd probably have to get a bigger size as he grows. So for one season/show they've held up better than expected. I'm just glad the size that worked for him was significantly cheaper than the next size up.

customer_reviews.title: Get a size 7 if you're a 9
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size nine...Saw it ran big so bought a size 8. The size 8 still has 2 fingers I can fit between the heel and shoe back. I didn't have time to return them for a new one. They're still nice to dance in, even though they're too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed & Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping on time and shoes look and fit to size chart. Very excited for this purchase and would definitely buy again.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: They were very very big
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to order shoes online but we measured her feet according to the measurements provided and ordered two sizes. They were H U G E. Definitely seemed like men's sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Merestwins43

customer_reviews.title: Too Large for Me and Stiff Ankle
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get a flexible, more athletic shoe that I could practice some of my more difficult dance moves in (most of my dance shoes are heels). It's possible someone else might like this, but I found the shoe to be too large for me despite following their size recommendations. It also felt like the top of the shoe would bite into my ankle if I wore it for any extended period of time, which wouldn't work for what I wanted it for. I ended up returning it (which was a smooth process, btw), but it might work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run Very Large
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run extremely large. My daughter is normally a 7.5. She had to downsize to a 5.5. If I had read the fit chart and actually measured her foot the first time, we wouldn’t be stuck with shoes that will never fit her. ****I would recommend the company make a note of these shoes running large and to be sure to measure the foot prior to ordering.
customer_reviews.author: LB Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Too big. way too big.
customer_reviews.text: This jazz shoe is clearly sized in MENS sizes, not womens. beware if you are ordering on a short deadline. I ordered size 10 womens (wear a 9.5 street size) and this shoe is at least an inch too long, and generally just too big all over, not the fit you want for jazz/dance shoes. my feet are swimming in them. Not as good of quality as Capezio/So Danca, but if you need them for a 3-min dance you should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling girl

customer_reviews.title: Right Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 8.5 in women for my daughter because I didn't know what to think after reading all the reviews. She wears an 8 in women and I'm glad I chose the 8.5. If I would've went up to a 9 it would've been to big or if I got the 7.5 it would've been to small. Thank God it fits all the way around because her competition is this Friday!
customer_reviews.author: LalaRose

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with an outdoor sole.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter in colorguard. I was pleasantly surprised by the great quality and outdoor soles. Last year we bought some that had holes on them within a month. The quality of these should hold up the entire season. I would absolutely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: michelle  passey

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for big feet
customer_reviews.text: My son needed jazz shoes for auditions, he is not a dancer, over 6ft with size 12 feet. The 12’s were much to small so reordered 14 and these fitted great. I think if he was use to jazz shoes he could have got away with smaller size but he found the tightness unusual and uncomfortable. Quality looks ok, return was easy and delivery quick. Very thankful to find larger size and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got for 16 year old son for school plays. He wears a size 11 1/2 sneaker and the 12 fit perfect. He says these are super comfortable and easy on and off which is important. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a fine budget shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine budget shoe. I'm using them for a musical theatre production with a couple dance numbers and they feel and look great. Don't expect them to last you through a lot of use, though. Upon close inspection, you can see them wearing out after only a dozen rehearsals. For sizing reference...I wear a Converse size 10 or 11. I chose size 12 for these, and they're just a touch spacious. I think real dancers prefer a tighter fit so maybe go for an 11, but I would have been very unhappy in a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L Davies

customer_reviews.title: All the sizes are for a medium not regular fit -- I didn't notice because they are all M
customer_reviews.text: Additionally, my kid didn't wear this shoe right away for dance class so by the time she tried them on -- they were way too big. I didn't understand but I guess it is because its 8.5 M which means medium. I didn't even notice because they are all mediums. Since it's past 30 days, I cannot return. I am back to square one hunting for dance shoes -- so frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fusello

customer_reviews.title: order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughters once a week jazz class. These were significantly cheaper than buying them from the dance studio. They are holding up well, shes worn them once a week for 2 months. She wears a size 3.5 shoe, i had ordered a 4 in this but it was too small. I returned and ordered a 5, fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for theater and dance
customer_reviews.text: Jazz shoe fits just like a jazz shoe should. Jazz shoes in general don’t have arch support and fit oddly; but I’m told by experts, that how they are.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Branton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price, good fit.  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in musical after musical at our local theater. She goes through jazz shows like crazy! Literally dances holes through them. These are the best quality for the price, we’ve tried many and these are the ones we like the best. Good fit but not too tight, good quality and not crazy expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: They fit my son's size 12 feet!
customer_reviews.text: So far, he is pleased with the fit, and the shoes seem pretty durable. He is in the middle of performances for his current show so we will know more about durability after the run.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a costume
customer_reviews.text: My son needed these to be in youth theatre, and so far they have lasted through two productions lasting 9 weeks each, so we're doing well with them!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Too baggy
customer_reviews.text: These were way too loose for my daughter who wears a women's 8.5. The length was good, but the shoe was just baggy. They would probably work for a man's or anyways be with a thicker foot. They should be more stretchy to form to the foot and these definitely weren't that. Sent them back and ordered Capezio which were much better!
customer_reviews.author: Team Davis

customer_reviews.title: No need to break them in
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who landed a dancing role in a musical. He was able to use them the day they arrived. It was much easier for him to learn choreography in these shoes than in black dress shoes!
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for theater
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed shoes for her costume in theater. What an inexpensive but good quality shoe. Seems to run a little large, but worked for the purpose intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mad's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These jazz shoes are lovely! When in doubt on the size, I’d suggest ordering a size bigger. Especially if they will be wearing socks with them. My child wears 7 or 7.5 in women’s sneakers and the 7 is too small! I’m going to reorder an 8 and expect good results.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: medium with is more like a wide width
customer_reviews.text: Am very disappointed in this product. My school had a dance showcase on December 8th 2018 for which these shoes where needed. we place and order for 11 size 14 medium width however the width received is more of a wide width. Instead of the sock type fit it look like a boat on everyone feet, so much so that some members could not use them, affecting the overall presentation of most of the dances in the showcase
customer_reviews.author: Carol Matthew - Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Size down.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. These are amazing. We are on our 3rd pair since we love them so much. I do recommend going down a full size. The tan pair I bought in 7.5 and the black in a 7 and 8. My daughter wears 8.5/9 street shoes and the 7.5 fit perfectly. The right amount of snugness as they aren’t meant to be loose.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great order.
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually purchase dance shoes. Purchase was for my daughter who was in her high school musical. Shoes were exactly what she needed and they served their purpose. Delivery was fast and I was satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old bought these for her dance team at school. It was hard finding shoes to fit her but these were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Fine with a little help from a cobbler
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine, smooth soles that really help me to glide. However they needed a bit of "surgery." The upper cut into my ankle at the top and I had to have a cobbler sew the flap down for good comfort. If you look at the picture, you can see what I'm talking about. The upper now is flush with the stretch insets. An easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Girl

customer_reviews.title: Buttery soft leather,  super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these dance shoes. I wanted more cushion, so I slipped an insole that gives more heel support, and gets thinner as it goes towards the toes, allowing a soft arch area, and ability to point with shoe. The leather is buttery soft, and looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra piccione

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter switched dance studios and needed to have tan jazz shoes instead of black so we ordered these. We ordered them a little big and they fit perfectly. I love the quality of the shoes and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Shoes smell awful.
customer_reviews.text: They fit, but they smell awful and even tried to air them out, but it did not get rid of the smell. It reminds me of very strong mothballs. I had to return them. This is the third pair I bought, and I didn't have any problems with the first two.
customer_reviews.author: ny5

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: The products were somewhat small but i was able to give them away to someone that was one size smaller than me and they used them through the time i had my dance class. They said the shoes were great. Other than the shoes not fitting on a size 14 they fitted someone that was size 13.
customer_reviews.author: Buenrostro

customer_reviews.title: Tricky finding the "right fit."
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter. She is ten and wears a size 7- 71/2 womens. Yikes...I know. I ordered her a size 8 and she actually has no wiggle room at the top of the shoe but the sides are a little too wide. I'm going to keep them however because I can't order a size down. The price was good and I have no regrets ordering them from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product and Fairly Priced
customer_reviews.text: Great customer support. My daughter purchased these and they were a hair tight (I think she mis-sized), so I just returned them and quickly received a replacement pair. Easy-peasy and my daughter is actually wearing them right now at her play rehearsal as I type this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Needed These For a School Play
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is not a dancer but needed these shoes for a school play. We measured her foot using the exact directions and they were a perfect fit. They fit snug but all the other reviewers said that's how they're supposed to fit and they stretch. These were great for what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Flynt58

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with quality. They were double the price at the dance studio and these are the (basically) the same. Follow the sizing because it was different for my daughter. She usually wears a 3 but was a size 5.5 in these Jazz shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfort and style.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I bought jazz shoes so I don't have much comparison, but I can confirm that they met my expectations. Well made, super soft and comfortable. It feels like you are barefoot, except they give you better control during dance. I followed instructions on how to measure my foot to ensure proper fit. I already danced in them and shoes stayed securely on the feet. I will definitely buy this brand or this specific shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Linodes (Tent) Leather Upper Jazz Shoe Slip-on for Women and Men
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter wears a 7.5, so that's what I was told to order. They were way too big, by a couple of inches. She couldn't wear them for the dance performance that she needed them for. They didn't come in a box, so I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had to return this item twice already because it fits my 11 yr old too small. He wears a 6 so we got him a 6.5. Too small and tight. I then ordered a 7.5 and still too small! I just went ahead and ordered a size 8.5, hoping that they fit just right. Quality of the shoe feels good but we will see after he wears them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Monserath Fraga

customer_reviews.title: Great little jazz shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great little jazz shoe. My son has to wear for a musical and he's not dancing...so cheap was my goal.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school performance
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these Jazz shoes for my son because black jazz shoes were required for a school musical performance. The shoes arrived quickly and fit perfectly. We ordered a second pair because he lost the first (!) and the second set of shoes arrived even more quickly - just in time for tech week. The shoes survived tech week, four performances and are still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Right sizing
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fit as needed. My daughter is a Womans size 7. Based on the comments I was debating on sizing up or down but decided not to because they are returnable. I ordered a 7 and they fit as they should. Not tight or lose but snugly enough for them to stretch with use.
customer_reviews.author: Lalyz

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoe, but big toenail too close to top and end of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really sweet style and I may reorder 1/2 size bigger than my normal shoe size. I wear a 7 1/2 and ordered I think a 7 1/2 and it was just a wee bit too small. But with dancing, didn't want to constantly bump my toenail. So sent back and got refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ponytail at Echo golf

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed Jazz Shoes for her dance performances at school and this worked out great. The price was good and the quality as well. Since she is growing, I bought her a 1/2 size up and they worked out well. She complained that her feet hurt, but I think that she isn't used to wearing shoes made this way (Jazz shoes only have support at the toe and heel in order to bend in the middle of the foot). So far they have been holding up well and I'd buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reagan

customer_reviews.title: These are great dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great dance shoes, they don't leave blisters and match any outfit, just don't wear them outside (like on the pavement) they will ware out quickly- always take them and change before your dance
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sized up
customer_reviews.text: We read through reviews and it seemed pretty mixed so we first started with sizing down. We ended up having to order three different pairs, but finally got one to fit! My daughter is 11 and tennis shoe is size 5. The jazz shoe that fit her is a size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki M

customer_reviews.title: Works like they are supposed to...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who needed them for a musical at school. He didn't complain so I guess they were useful for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product just came a littler larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: She likes the shoe and it's feel but it was larger than expected and bulging out at the heel. Probably should have ordered a 6 or regular instead but that is what she normally wears and didn't know that they wear a little larger. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: jpterrasi

customer_reviews.title: Great Materials and Perfect Stitching
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable while still having more than a 5 min lifespan of use. Most Jazz slippers last me for maybe one or two performances, these are made to not just give your foot the flexibility it needs, but also from the need to tape them as soon as you get them.
customer_reviews.author: InkPaper007

customer_reviews.title: rubbery bottom
customer_reviews.text: Hi I had hoped to do ballroom dance practice, but they stick to the floor. Maybe Jazz shoes are supposed to do that, but I did not know that. I am returning them, looking for shoes with felt or suede bottoms. sorry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marturano

customer_reviews.title: Great for dancing in the ensemble
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these for ensemble in the musical Chitty Chitty Bang Bang. They help up nicely and were comfortable. No complaints from her (and she is typically picky). Much cheaper than our local dance shop.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J. Devor

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for dance practice.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price. It was reasonable. My daughter is not yet a professional dancer so I didn't wan't to spend to much money on a passing interest. These shoes see to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kelsch

customer_reviews.title: Way Too BIG
customer_reviews.text: These dance shoes are way too big. Sizes don't compare to other shoes. Had to send back and run to dance store to find shoes that fit my daughter. Would not recommend buying especially since my money still hasn't been refunded and item was sent back
customer_reviews.author: HappyinPA

customer_reviews.title: Like dancing barefoot.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t particularly care for these shoes for jazz dancing. The soles are so thin that they provide little between your feet and the dance floor. I am not a barefoot dancer but these are almost the same as being barefoot. I can’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Boetger

customer_reviews.title: Close to Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a pinch for a show I was performing in as the pair that I ordered through a different supplier never arrived. These were half a size smaller than my everyday shoes, which is industry standard, fit perfectly when I put them on upon receiving them, and took little time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Kjax

customer_reviews.title: Too big...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were just so big! I'm used to getting dance shoes half a size up, but you can't do that with these shoes. Do not follow the sizing chart provided. They run half a size large and they stretch because they're leather. But the real reason I ended up returning these is because I don't like the shape of the shoe. The top of the shoe (where a shoe tongue would usually be) rubbed against my ankle and was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: May Rave

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy enough to survive rehearsals and performances. Very economical solution.
customer_reviews.author: J. HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Size 8
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was on time. I ordered a size 8 for my 14 year old daughter she likes the fit (she has wide feet) she wears them for dance class & so far they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: We found out last minute that my daughter needed jazz shoes for her school play. These were a very reasonable price and with prime delivery, we got them in time. Worked out perfectly, sized according to the sizing chart, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The sizing chart is dead on, super comfortable and so far durable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Holsten

product_meta.title: Linodes (Tent Leather Upper Jazz Shoe Slip-on for Women and Men's Dance Shoes
feature_bullets: High Quality Leather Upper and Arch Insert Design
Split sole, EVA sole patch and heel
SIZE: Please measure your feet length first and choose according to the size information of Linodes (Tent) Leather Upper Jazz Shoe Slip-on for Women and Men's Dance Shoes
